text: Jake Pates (born July 30, 1998) is an American snowboarder. He competed in the halfpipe at the 2018 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:American male snowboarders Category:Olympic snowboarders of the United States Category:Snowboarders at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Competitors at the 2016 Winter Youth Olympics Category:Youth Olympic gold medalists for the United States
title: Jake Pates
